short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the latest blockchain news, market data and prices in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chain News is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension that keeps you updated with the latest blockchain news, market data, and prices in one place. Whether you're a blockchain enthusiast, investor, or developer, this extension provides you with all the information you need to stay informed and make informed decisions.

The extension has a sleek and modern design, with a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to navigate and find the information you need. The header has a stylish design that makes it easy to read and find the latest news, market data, and prices. The extension is equipped with a button for scheduling notifications, which allows you to receive a daily notification at a specific time
